welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Van Wert, a charming city known for its friendly community and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer, from historic landmarks to local dining and shopping."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Findlay Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Findlay Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allen County Airport is a modern and efficient facility, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Allen County Airport is designed to accommodate private and corporate aircraft, offering a wide range of services and amenities for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Neil Armstrong Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all air freight and cargo operations at Neil Armstrong Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
